english.segment1: Watching from the shadows, stealing all thats left. Great deceiver, (so) beautiful. Fading moments, passing like years. Wish everything. was perfect.
english.segment2: Im all Ill ever need, so go away. Keep your lies. For every wish, theres hope and time.
english.segment3: Now its complicated, I wish I was medicated. Theres gotta be some way out of here. Looking for release. to end the greatest need.
english.segment4: Im all Ill ever need, so go away. Keep your lies. For every wish. theres hope and time. (x 2)
english.segment5: GOD HELP ME!!. GOD HELP ME!!
english.segment6: Gotta peel away the skin, just find The Truth in here. (x 2)
english.segment7: Im all Ill ever need, so go away. Keep your lies. For every wish, theres hope and time. (x 2)
